title: loadScript Function
description: Loads a JavaScript file by creating a script tag and appending it to the DOM.

methods.title: function loadScript(url: string): Promise<HTMLScriptElement>
methods.description: Loads a JavaScript file by creating a script tag and appending it to the DOM.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the JavaScript file.

methods.returns: Returns the script element on success.
